Index >  ShowPageNumber

ShowPageNumber

Description

Returns or sets whether to show the page number at the top left corner of the viewer, only valid when the view mode is set to n * n (n > 1).

Data type

<bool>

Default value

false

Syntax

.ShowPageNumber = true;

Remarks

This property only works in the HTML5 edition.

If the property is true, the page number will be displayed at the top left corner of the viewer. If it is false, the page number will not be displayed.

See also

SetViewMode
